name: ConsciousParentsThrivingKids
0:
”Alexa, open Conscious Parents Thriving Kids”
”Alexa, start Conscious Parents Thriving Kids”
”Alexa, ask Conscious Parents Thriving Kids”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: conscious parents thriving kids
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Worldwide Parent Coach and Conscious Educator, Sue DeCaro is on a mission to revitalize the joy in parenting! Conscious Parents, Thriving Kids is a podcast designed to help parents all over the world create deeper connections with themselves and their children, so their families can thrive. Listen in for parenting stories, successes, pitfalls and supportive coaching techniques to move through the challenges and chaos on your parenting journey. Enjoy transformational conversations with experts, educators, and parents who will inspire and inform you as you tap into your own values in parenting.

Here are a few quick tips when navigating our skill. The First thing to note, when opening the skill you’ll be playing the latest episode, but if that’s not what you’re looking for, you can always find something more specific. This skill allows you to play next or previous episode. In addition, you can ask the skill to play the newest or oldest episodes or if you want to get specific, play a specific episode by saying the episode number. Try some of these commands:

**Next/Previous Episode**
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, next”
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, previous”

**Select Latest Episode**
— “Alexa, ask Conscious Parents Thriving Kids to play latest episode” 

**Select First Episode**
— “Alexa, ask Conscious Parents Thriving Kids to start from first episode”
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
